long_description: Outfitted with top-notch Shimano Ultegra components, the Scott Foil 10 carbon road bike uses an aerodynamic design to optimize speed during races and endurance rides and weighs in at 16.5 lbs. Full-carbon frame is designed to maximize aerodynamic efficiency using foil-inspired tube shapes, all while offering a road racing geometry for exceptional handling. Additional frame highlights include carbon dropouts with replaceable hanger, oversized, stiff bottom bracket, tapered head tube and internal cable routing. All-carbon fork with tapered steerer ensures precision when carving turns at speed. Shimano Ultegra 53/39 crank is paired with an 11-32 cassette to give you a wide range of gearing. Syncros RR2.0 wheels spin on hubs using DT Swiss internals for lasting, smooth-spinning performance. Continental Grand Sport Race tires ensure light, fast-rolling performance and offer puncture protection. Please note: pedals are sold separately. Specs on the Scott Foil 10 carbon road bike are subject to change.
